title: Borked

en: {color=#ff0000}{b}ERROR{/b}: Program has run into an unexplained error and must close.{/color}
You've received that error five times tonight. How in the world are you going to deal with this?

yes_caption: Ask for help in online forums.
no_caption: Try to fix it yourself with an old trick.

en: You ask for help in the forums, and by the next morning you have a solution. The program is up and running, ready for your next session.
After cursing and struggling, you get it running again, with some pride. You barely work afterwards, and the frustration follows you into your dreams.
